text: James Winchester Montgomery (May 29, 1921 â€“ October 23, 2019) was an American bishop. He was the ninth bishop of Chicago in The Episcopal Church. He was born in Chicago. Montgomery died on October 23, 2019 in Naperville, Illinois at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Episcopalian bishops Category:Religious leaders from Chicago Category:People from Naperville, Illinois
title: James W. Montgomery
